sentence.Network_en: When your children misbehave tell them without making them feel small.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子表现不佳时要让他们知道，但不能让他们自惭形秽。

sentence.Network_en: Paying children too much attention when they misbehave can be self-defeating.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子有不良行为时，小题大做可能适得其反。

sentence.Network_en: I'll disown you if you misbehave.
sentence.Network_cn: 要是你不规矩,我就和你断绝关系.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新编大学英语单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... lord n. 首领，君主，主人 misbehave v. 行为不端 obtain v. 获取.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(M) ... misbegotten 私生的 misbehave 行为无礼貌 misbehavior 不礼貌.
词根词缀记单词- 沪江碎碎图文集 ... misarrange v. 排列错误； misbehave v. 行为不检； mischance n. 不幸；.
杨柳词汇讲义__考研 - 豆丁网 ... misbelieve 错误的信仰； misbehave 行为不当 Mono- 一，单一.

list.abs: For goodness sake , stop misbehaving !, 看在老天爷的份上 , 别胡闹了!
cats misbehave when they are bored., 猫规矩的时候 , 他们是无聊.
cats misbehave when they are bored., 猫规矩的时候 , 他们是无聊.
behave badly or improperly 行为不端;举止不当 eg: She misbehaved. 她行为不端。 21. subtitle n. (usu. pl. 通常作数) (esp. cinema 尤用于电影).

entry.tran: (尤指儿童)行为不当，举止失礼
entry.def: If someone, especially a child, misbehaves, they behave in a way that is not acceptable to other people.

example.ex: When the children misbehaved she was unable to cope.
example.tran: 孩子们调皮捣蛋的时候她管不了。

auth_sentence.content: When they misbehave we can say they're playing up.
auth_sentence.res_content: When they misbehave we can say they're playing up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When they misbehave we can say they're playing up.

auth_sentence.content: The jet stream was free to misbehave.
auth_sentence.res_content: The jet stream was free to misbehave.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The jet stream was free to misbehave.

auth_sentence.content: Go off and misbehave yourselves somewhere else.
auth_sentence.res_content: Go off and misbehave yourselves somewhere else.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Go off and misbehave yourselves somewhere else.

sentences.en: I’ve heard reports about his misbehaviour.
sentences.cn: 我曾听到过关于他行为不端的传闻。
